uts.wsd.teamtwo.rest

Class ReviewRestService

  • java.lang.Object
    • uts.wsd.teamtwo.rest.ReviewRestService

  • @Path(value="")
public class ReviewRestService
extends java.lang.Object
    The REST service which provides access to the collection of Reviews stored by the server. Responses are provided in XML format.
    Author:
    Deinyon L Davies

      • searchReviews

        @Path(value="/reviews")
@GET
@Produces(value="application/xml")
public Reviews searchReviews(@QueryParam(value="hotelId")
                                      int hotelId,
                                      @QueryParam(value="startDate")
                                      java.lang.String startDateStr,
                                      @QueryParam(value="endDate")
                                      java.lang.String endDateStr,
                                      @QueryParam(value="starRating")
                                      java.lang.String ratingStr)
        Generates a set of reviews, filtered by all (may be null) of the parameters.
        Parameters:
        name - The partial name of the matching hotel (match will contain 'name' in its name.
        country - The country of the matching hotel.
        Returns:
        The set of hotels that has been filtered by the parameters.

      • parseDate

        private java.util.Date parseDate(java.lang.String strDate)
                          throws java.text.ParseException
        Used to parse a valid date-string to a Java Date. Date strings should be formatted as JAXB dates: yyyy-MM-dd
        Parameters:
        strDate - The date as a valid (formatted) string
        Returns:
        The string date as a Java date
        Throws:
        java.text.ParseException - If the string was not a valid JAXB date
